title: Advertisement, "Restaurant Bellevues: After the Evening Performance", ca. 1990–93
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description: The design is comprised of a central columnar photographic image, surrounded by white space on either side. The diagonal view, set within a theatrical venue, shows patrons in evening dress seated in ornately styled box seats, the whole brightly lighted by chandeliers. Copy imprinted left and right advertises Restaurant [sans serif] Bellevues [bold, ornate script with unjoined letters]. When folded back toward the center, the copy in the left and right sections forms a whole.

tombstone.epitaph:
Advertisement, "Restaurant Bellevues: After the Evening Performance", ca. 1990–93.
ca. 1990–93. Offset lithography. Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.. 1993-151-190.
